title: Formative Assessment Process Based on Peer Feedback for Scientific Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific terminology and understanding of writing structures
context.additional_context: Mobile learning in BYOD environments, operating a peer assessment system to enhance scientific writing competencies

learning_goals: Learners can revise the argumentative structure of scientific writing with 80% accuracy based on peer feedback.
Learners can supplement the scientific rationale of writing by over 70% according to peer evaluation.
Learners participate in the process of exchanging feedback at least twice via a mobile platform with over 90% engagement.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
